price: Wọ́n wí pé: “Dájúdájú tí ìwọ Nūh kò bá jáwọ́ (nibí ìpèpè rẹ) dájúdájú o máa wà nínú àwọn tí a máa jù lókò.”
arabic: قَالُواْ لَئِن لَّمۡ تَنتَهِ يَٰنُوحُ لَتَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلۡمَرۡجُومِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: qālū la-in lam tantahi yānūḥu latakūnanna mina al-marjūmīna
